mapper.select: select usid,ssq.userid as userid,username,orderid,ordertime,ssq_issue,redball,blueball,sigprice,multinum from ( select a.usid as usid,userid,orderid,ordertime,ssq_issue,redball,blueball,sigprice,multinum from (select usid,userid,orderid,ordertime,ssq_issue from userSsq where usid=#{usid}) a inner join (select usid,redball,blueball,sigprice,multinum from betSsq) b on a.usid = b.usid ) ssq inner join (select userid,username from users) u on ssq.userid = u.userid
